### MaskArchive { #medmask.storage.archivefile.MaskArchive }

```python
storage.archivefile.MaskArchive(path, mode='r', *, space=None, codec=None)
```

Container storing multiple segmentation masks in one file.

On-disk layout::

    Header (100 B)
        magic       "MSKA" (4)
        version     0x0100 (2 bytes)  â€¢ major/minor
        codec_id    (B)
        space_offset, space_length   (Q, Q)
        index_offset, index_length   (Q, Q)
        data_offset,  data_length    (Q, Q)
        mask_count                   (Q)
        reserved (27 B)

Fixed-size 100-byte header simplifies random access and future extension.
